name: Spike Flap
description:
Spike Flap is a game where you play as a fun-looking Bird!

You can customize your bird in different outfits, just make sure you collected enough coins!

Try to avoid the spikes! They are deadly to birds like yourself...

Fullscreen the game to properly see it and don't mess with the Fullscreen Toggle in the options menu.

Pressing the Quit button in the Main Menu will also crash the game in the browser.
